questions.question: A machine learning team wants to quickly build and customize a fraud detection solution using SageMaker Jumpstart. They need to fine-tune the pre-trained model for their specific dataset. Which TWO techniques should they use to tailor the model for their needs? (Choose Two)
options: Manually write a training script to run on SageMaker training jobs.
Use SageMaker automatic hyperparameter tuning to optimize model performance for their data.
Fine-tune the pre-trained model by training it on their custom dataset.
Develop a custom algorithm from scratch and integrate it with SageMaker Jumpstart.
Use prompt engineering to shape the input prompts and encourage the desired response.
correct_answers: Use SageMaker automatic hyperparameter tuning to optimize model performance for their data.
Fine-tune the pre-trained model by training it on their custom dataset.
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate MLA-C01
